question: Munderwa Sugar Mill has been recently inaugurated in which Indian state?
explanation: Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath inaugurated the newly established Munderwa Sugar Mill of Uttar Pradesh State Sugar Corporation Limited in Basti district. Munderwa Sugar Mill has a capacity of 5,000 Tons of Cane per Day (TCD).It will generate 27 MW of electricity. It is expected that in the crushing season 2019-20, Munderwa will work at full capacity. In the current crushing season, the approximate crushing of about 60 lakh quintals of cane is expected and will produce 6.25 lakh quintals of sugar.The Mill will benefit around 30,000 sugarcane farmers of mill area in their cane supplies.
